post.body: Is there a "retweet" button for ZeroMe?

What I'd really like is a gateway that is similar to a proxy but can be configured to display only pages of a given set of zeronet sites. For example, to mirror personal sites and to share with non-zeronet users.
Another idea is to enable two-way bridge with clearnet sites. Matrix/Riot got it working with IRC, Slack, etc. It'll make zeronet apps so much more useful!

comment.body: @Viperasi: a pity... I'd go so far to claim without "retweet" it ain't no social network

@Zcyzcy88: there is a difference. A "retweet" is (1) a conscious decision to share some content with followers (2) and optionally with my own comment, The (2) is a crucial way of propagating content and opinions through a social network to stimulate participation. Pure "comment" won't cut it, and pure "reshare" (or the broadcast of liked content) won't cut it either.
